  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_332</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_332</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Figuras geométricas del plano</string>
            <string language="en">Geometric shapes on the plane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrische Formen auf der Fläche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formes géométriques sur l'avion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formas geométricas no plano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Figure geometriche sull'aereo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωμετρικές μορφές στο αεροπλάνο</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el cálculo de áreas de figuras planas. Se estudia el cálculo del área del cuadrado, rectángulo, triángulo, rombo y trapecio.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to calculate the surface area of plane shapes. It studies the areas of the square, rectangle, triangle, rhombus and trapezium</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">trapecio</string>
            <string language="en">trapezium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">área</string>
            <string language="en">area</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">rombo</string>
            <string language="en">rhombus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cuadrado</string>
            <string language="en">square</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">plano</string>
            <string language="en">plane</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">rectángulo</string>
            <string language="en">rectangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, die Fläche der flachen Formen zu errechnen. Sie 
studiert die Bereiche des Quadrats, des Viereckes, des Dreiecks, des 
Rhombus und des Trapezium</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de calculer la superficie des formes plates. Elle 
étudie les zones de la place, du rectangle, de la triangle, du 
losange et du trapezium</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações calcular a
área de superfície de formas planas. Estuda as áreas do 
quadrado, do retângulo, do triângulo, do rhombus e do trapésio</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
calcolare l'area delle figure piane. Studia le zone del 
quadrato, del rettangolo, del triangolo, del rhombus e del trapezium</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να υπολογίσει τον τομέα επιφάνειας των μορφών αεροπλάνων. 
Μελετά τις περιοχές του τετραγώνου, του ορθογωνίου, του 
τριγώνου, του ρόμβου και του τραπεζίου</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trapezium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rhombus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quadrat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fläche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Viereck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">trapezium</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">quadrado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
